mapper.select: SELECT p.parent_id , p.name,p.ename,p.url,p.create_time,p.update_time FROM tb_user AS u LEFT JOIN tb_user_role AS ur ON u.id=ur.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_role AS r ON r.id=ur.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_role_permission AS rp ON rp.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN tb_permission AS p ON p.id=rp.permission_id WHERE u.id=#{userId}
